Hi all - 

A friend is looking for a lone (single) katana size iron kashira with "dragonfly" motif. Kind of a long-shot to locate a single kashira--they are what usually get lost--but I said I'd ask around. Let me know if anyone has such a thing and if it is available. You two can then work out an agreeable deal. Nice guy. Would like to help him out. Contact me off-list: swords@...  Thanks!

Ron
